data: {"page":1,"results":[{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99,36,10770],"id":395663,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Attenborough at 90: Behind the Lens","overview":"As Sir David Attenborough turns 90, this intimate film presents new interviews, eye-opening behind-the-scenes footage and extraordinary clips from some of his most recent films. The doc, which was made for the occasion of Attenborough’s 90th birthday, was shot over seven years and follows him as he travels to Borneo, Morocco and the Galapagos to shoot wildlife specials. Anthony Geffen, the CEO of Atlantic Productions, commented, “This is such a special Attenborough film because unusually he is the subject. As I look back over the last seven years, I never fail to be amazed by his extraordinary ambition and drive to use the very latest technology to communicate the natural world to audiences around the globe. This film gives audiences the chance to see what it’s like to be on the road with David.”","popularity":3.561,"poster_path":"/zR9ySn9KgkBTblzrXi1SSNTnxAO.jpg","release_date":"2016-04-30","title":"Attenborough at 90: Behind the Lens","video":false,"vote_average":8.4,"vote_count":7},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[18,36],"id":868852,"original_language":"sk","original_title":"Ežo Vlkolinský","overview":"","popularity":1.81,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"1978-01-01","title":"Ežo Vlkolinský","video":false,"vote_average":8.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[18,36],"id":236795,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Teddy the Rough Rider","overview":"This short follows the political career of Theodore Roosevelt, beginning in 1895, when he was appointed police commissioner of New York City. In 1897 he was appointed Assistant Secretary of the Navy. His charge up San Juan Hill during the Spanish-American War in 1898 is re-created. He becomes vice president in March 1901 and assumes the presidency when William McKinley is assassinated six months later. According to the narrator, Roosevelt refused to be beholden to political bosses, doing what he believed to be right for the American people.","popularity":3.353,"poster_path":"/y2m7Ip6YziLfHQTY9A05QH5m6aH.jpg","release_date":"1940-02-21","title":"Teddy the Rough Rider","video":false,"vote_average":5.9,"vote_count":7},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/mHz65gYQ3SmkQH3GKWSKWUkK5zW.jpg","genre_ids":[18,36],"id":551332,"original_language":"en","original_title":"The Two Popes","overview":"Frustrated with the direction of the church, Cardinal Bergoglio requests permission to retire in 2012 from Pope Benedict. Instead, facing scandal and self-doubt, the introspective Pope Benedict summons his harshest critic and future successor to Rome to reveal a secret that would shake the foundations of the Catholic Church.","popularity":21.285,"poster_path":"/4d4mTSfDIFIbUbMLUfaKodvxYXA.jpg","release_date":"2019-11-27","title":"The Two Popes","video":false,"vote_average":7.501,"vote_count":2781},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/rDNS622V4gZBktsXWiEqVd4SQB1.jpg","genre_ids":[37,18,36,10752,10770],"id":230698,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Houston: The Legend of Texas","overview":"Sam Elliot stars as Sam Houston, the visionary who nearly single-handedly forged the state of Texas into a powerful entity in its own right. Refusing to forget the Alamo (as if anyone could), Houston led the military in Texas' rebellion against Mexico. G.D. Spradlin co-stars as President Andrew Jackson, with Michael Beck appearing as Jim Bowie, James Stephens as Stephen Austin, and Richard Yniguez as Mexican General Santa Anna. Lensed on location in the Lone Star state, this sweeping made-for-TV film originally occupied three hours' screen time on November 22, 1986. Its title at that time was Houston: The Legend of Texas. ~ Hal Erickson, Rovi","popularity":6.439,"poster_path":"/sqOnNiYrnMP6i2nFE7lzjm7zBEJ.jpg","release_date":"1986-11-22","title":"Houston: The Legend of Texas","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":7},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/sJY1hv7M0GLZ84fe7zwwY6OGrmH.jpg","genre_ids":[18,36],"id":547213,"original_language":"bg","original_title":"Юлия Вревская","overview":"The film is based on a true dramatic story of the fate of a wonderful Russian woman - Countess Yulia Petrovna Vrevskaya, one of the first Petersburg beauties.
